resources.string: You can go to your phone dial pad and call to *#06# to view your IMEI Number
For best test results follow the following instructions :
Ensure that your headphone is connected to the phone jack
Connect your USB cable to a power or data source
Ensure that you have an active internet connection or your phone is connected to WIFI with internet connection
Follow the instructions as prompted while the test is being conducted

Please press the continue button & this will show the device's IMEI information screen.
 
 If you are able to see the dial pad with number "*#06#" then please delete "#" and type "#" again within 10 seconds and before you hear the beep sound or feel vibration.
 
 In case you are unable to delete and retype "#" within 10 seconds and hear the beep sound or feel vibration, you will be asked to try again.

Note: Back camera LED flash, Vibrator and Bluetooth will be turned on automatically. After completion of the test, these will be turned off automatically. During test do not connect to AC charger or Wireless charger or computer via USB cable.
Your QC Certificate is successfully uploaded on the cloud. Download from partner portal qc.xtracover.com. Use the IMEI/Certificate Number to search.
